    public class ExtendedTable
extends com.vaadin.ui.Table
    Provides a simple way to build a vaadin Table with some custom functionalities offered by annotations. For more informations about functionnalities see UIFieldBinding and UIBeanBinding .
    Author:
    Raphael Rougemont
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
